refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The bonobo-context code is designed to provide a way to expose CORBA contexts through a single C interface. This is so that language bindings can get away with wrapping a single function, and yet have access to the whole Bonobo service framework. Two examples of this are the MonikerContext and the RunningContext ( see Bonobo_Context.idl ).

example.title: Getting and using the moniker context

refsect1.para:
The list of contexts is open and may be expanded in the future, currently there are the following:
Activation - Bonobo/MonikerContext
Running - Bonobo/RunningContext
